settings.text2:
Active Ingredients: Menthol 11% - Topical Analgesic

Use: For the temporary relief of minor aches and pains of muscles and joints associated with simple backache, arthritis, strains, bruises, and sprains

Warnings: For external use only

Do not use: Do not use around the eye area, on open wounds, cuts, damaged or infected skin, mouth, genitals, or any other mucous membrane.

Directions: Adults and children two years of age and older: Apply to affected area not more than 3 to 4 times daily. Children under two years of age: consult a physician

settings.title: BENEFITS OF VIASOX PAIN RELIEF GEL

settings.heading: What's The Difference Between Viasox Pain Relief Gel And Other Brands?
settings.text: Viasox Pain Relief Gel offers a powerful 11% menthol formula that’s FDA-approved and up to 3x stronger than the competition. This allows you to receive professional strength that works in seconds and lasts for hours.

settings.heading: Why Is Viasox Pain Relief Gel Essential For People With Diabetes?
settings.text: High blood sugar (glucose) can injure nerves throughout the body and diabetic neuropathy most often damages nerves in the legs and feet. That’s why it’s important to use Viasox Pain Relief Gel because it relieves sharp, burning, or shooting pains associated with diabetic neuropathy.

settings.heading: How Long Does Viasox Pain Relief Gel Last For
settings.text: Viasox Pain Relief Gel lasts up to 7 hours

settings.heading: Active Ingredients
settings.text: Menthol - 11% - Topical Analgesic

settings.heading: Inactive Ingredients
settings.text:
Aloe, Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Benzoic Acid, Caprylic Capric Triglycerides, Cetereth-6
Olivate, Denatured Dehydrated Alcohol 40B, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin,
Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphat, Water, Xanthan Gum

settings.heading: Directions?
settings.text:
Adults and children two years of age and older: Apply to
affected area not more than 3 to 4 times daily. Children under two years of
age: consult a physician

settings.heading: Use?
settings.text:
For
the temporary relief of minor aches and pains of muscles and joints associated
with simple backache, arthritis, strains, bruises, and sprains

settings.heading: Do not use?
settings.text:
Do not use around the eye area, on open wounds, cuts,
damaged or infected skin, mouth, genitals, or any other mucous membrane. If
contact occurs, flush thoroughly with water if irritation conditions worsen, or
if symptoms persist for more than seven days, discontinue use of this product
and consult a physician

settings.heading: Warnings?
settings.text: For external use only!

settings.heading: Other Information
settings.text:
Keep
cap tightly closed store in a cool, dry, dark place. Keep out of reach of
children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a poison control center
